'''Retail Images''' File:Atheros_AR5BCB12_eng_sample_top_128F.jpg| File:Atheros_AR5BCB12_eng_sample_bot_128F.jpg|
[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] ==Notes== ==Tested ES cards== ===Aries CB10 (AR5BCB-01-02) - 00:03:7F:00:12:79, 06/14/2001=== ====lspci -nnv dump==== 
06:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5210 Wireless Network Adapter [AR5000 802.11a] [168c:0007] (rev 01)
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
====ath5k info dump==== 
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x0
ath: EEPROM indicates default country code should be used
ath: doing EEPROM country->regdmn map search
ath: country maps to regdmn code: 0x3a
ath: Country alpha2 being used: US
ath: Regpair used: 0x3a
ath5k: phy1: Atheros AR5210 chip found (MAC: 0x5, PHY: 0x3)
ath5k: phy1: RF5110 5GHz radio found (0x3)
